message.body: Jenny's so focused on this thing having an attitude (which I probably wouldn't even pick out on my own) that she can't even see that it's a dog, not a bear. Haha. I would hate being around babies and their toys all day.
What you just said. . . Exactly what I was thinking. All of it.
Compare what we think to Sam's response

Haha. I know, right? I love you too. Maybe they do just aim to superficially please each other by agreeing or making phony conversion. It's pretty sad that this dog/ bear is all that Jenny has to fret over.
Haha yeah that's what I mean. But it it's funny that Jenny got so worked up over this dog. She's funny
I just want to lie down and watch t.v. with you.
Aw. I've been pacing waiting for you. But ok. We will lay down, watch AHS, eat dulce de leche cakes, snuggle, and then some.
Sorry I got held up. That sounds good.
